Texts.Chs: 你知道的一切都是错误的。
我希望这些眼镜里有能适合我的，不过很可惜。另外需要一提的是，真多亏了凯文，我看起来像个白痴一样。
Texts.Eng: I wish these glasses fit me properly. But they don't. As a result, I look like an idiot. Thanks, Kevin.

Texts.Chs: 我很确定我的智力超越了你。
Texts.Eng: I'm pretty sure my intellect surpasses your paltry, pathetic knowledge base.

Texts.Chs: 你要硅？这很简单，把沙丢到萃取设备里就好了。
Texts.Eng: Silicon? That's easy. Loose Silt sand, in an extractor. How do you not know this by now?

Texts.Chs: 为了科学，我会在晚上的时候潜入你的房间看你睡觉。你应该理解这种为科学而献身的精神吧。
Texts.Eng: Sometimes I sneak into your ship at night and watch you sleep. For science. You understand, I'm sure.

Texts.Chs: 呃，有一千贰佰捌拾贰个毛囊在你的鼻子上，比我见过的所有人都恶心。
Texts.Eng: There are 1,682 follicles on your nose. Each more hateful than the last.

Texts.Chs: 你有哪样比我更好的东西？除了K4VC-9
Texts.Eng: There is no reality in which you are better than I am. Except K4VC-9.

Texts.Chs: 常量如果我这样代入进去的话，就会变成这样，对...原来是这样，我真是一个天才！
Texts.Eng: Universal Constants are that way for a reason. Why am I trying to change one?!?! Oh yea...I'm a GENIUS!
^yellow;*chk-chk-chk*^reset; If you annoy me, I'll beat the stupid right out of you.
^yellow;*chk-chk-tk*^reset;My Queen will return one day, and I shall rejoin the hive.
^yellow;*klack*^reset;I often wonder at how much force it would take to crush Kevins windpipe. That guy sucks.
^yellow;*tik-tik*^reset;Back off, fleshy one. I require personal space.
